Navigation

  • Home
  • About
  • Our Vendors
  • Services
  • Gallery
  • Be a Vendor
  • Contact Us

WELCOME we are the "market with heart", where people matter. Our local living and local giving support a variety of unique vendors, food and artisans.

The "Market with Heart", where people matter.

OPENING WEEKEND MAY 6TH SATURDAY 10AM - 4PM SATURDAY & SUNDAY

Be a Vendor Click and Pick
  • Facebook
  • Youtube
  • Instagram
SCROLL DOWN

Welcome to South Common Farmers’ Market 2018 , our 8th Year at Servus!
We believe in supporting the socially conscious local business community as they grow with us.
The market with HEART, where you will find a difference, we are a group of like-minded people who are working together to make a change in people’s lives. Whether that be from the vendors taking great pride in their products they sell, to supporting local charities.
We feel this completes the circle that sets us apart from other markets; the community supports the vendors that support the market, that support charities, that make our communities a better place for us all to live!
That is just one of the differences at South Common Farmers' Market, another one is being able to have easy access to the market site from all points (See Map), and to have ample parking as well (1500+stalls).
Plus we have curb side service via route #74.

100

Vendors

1500

Parking Stalls

5000+

Happy Customer

1350

Four Legged Friends

Our Awesome Vendors

Delight your senses and satisfy
every craving while discovering new flavours

What We Do

We’ve got everything you need to
grow your business at the Market

Strategic Partnerships

Brian Dahl & Arlene Dahl-Founder

We actively support partnerships and collaboration for growth, strategic thinking and access to resources to enable the market expansion. If you have great ideas, exciting opportunities, awareness campaigns, and public information to share we may be able to partner.

Service Credit Union

AIG Produce
Raman & Suki

We are proud to be partnered with Servus Credit Union, our corporate outreach in support of the community and market.

We go BAGLESS!

Catch of the Day
Emilie

How to grasscycle​? Sharing important information and great ideas are all welcome at our market. We are welcoming the City of Edmonton, they are sharing knowledge about the way to cut grass, not fill the city dump with clippings but leave it on the lawn. From quiz fun, to wheel spinning, and chances to win prizes your visit to the market has lots to offer you.

Only The Best

Homelicious Catering

Our market experience is so much more than simply fresh fruits and vegetables. There are many creative finds, such as jewelry makers, artists, glass bead artists and other unique crafts people.

Shop with Us!
We make things easy

You can browse some products in our shop using our site!!!
We got everything that you need.

Click and Pick

Meet The People In The Market

We have friendly Staff and Vendor's in the Market!

Our Clients

South Common Market has been
honored to partner up with these
clients

Vendors are very nice with great product, great food, prices are reasonable. Manager is the best. The popcorn is to die for... Best market I been to...

Gidget Mckay

Manages Mama G's Jam

We love this market and we're very impressed with the carnival last weekend! It was superb! It was so clean and well organized and had so many rides! Great job! Hopefully you can do it again next year.

Michelle Neveu

Alberta, Canada

We are closing in on the second season my team has taken part in this market - and we will DEFINITELY be back next year. The price can't be beat, and it is so much fun (of course there are hiccups here and there, it's all part of life and business!!).. Arlene and Brian do run a great market, and I have met some really wonderful people. I would recommend this market as a vendor AND as a patron (which I also have been :D )

Mandi Holden

Alberta, Canada

Best farmer market ever, love to go there every Saturday and Sunday

Rina Yudovich Variat

Manages COLBO Construction Ltd., Alberta, Canada

Great market! There is a very good selection of vendors and lots of free parking!

Candace Hiebert

Leader at Gold Canyon Alberta, Canada

Contact Us

Fill out these forms and we will be
in touch soon.

Send Us A Message

Contact Info

Where to Find Us

The S.E corner of 19th ave and Parsons Rd Edmonton, AB, Canada

Email Us At

info@southcommonmarket.ca

Call Us At

+1 780-686-5882

South Common Farmers Market is the market with heart. Located in the Alberta Research Park at 1903 Parsons Road, behind South Common Cineplex Theatres. Open every Saturday from 10 am - 4 pm, and Sunday from 10am-4pm. Farm fresh meat, veggies, fruit, corn and more. There are over 1500 parking stalls around the market, no two mile walks!! Beautifully trees and surrounding green spaces, its worth to come just for the food, friendly atmosphere and free parking!

Get Notified

We'll gladly send you an email to your inbox about any special sales or events. We also promise not to share it with anyone.

© Copyright South Common Market 2018

Created by South Common Market
